function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased focus on physical and mental well-being in building occupant health","Impact":"Failure to address all aspects of health may lead to overlooked risks and health issues in buildings","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive health assessments to identify and address all aspects of occupant health","Technologies":"Health assessment tools, sensors for monitoring indoor environmental quality","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, health professionals","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
